name: Space Launch Engineer
description:
As a head of young, but very ambitious space launch corporation, you have to become the best in this area and interlink all Sun System with your spacecraft. You will start from small tasks - testing of modules, orbital flights, but then things will become more serious!

Try to achieve different types of goals that the game offer to you, and eventually expand the borders of human civilization to the outer limits of the Sun System!
Principal features of the game:
  • Realistic physic and mathematic models. The Tsiolkovsky equation is taken into account!
  • Many different rocket modules that give a plenty of possible combinations;
  • Different types of missions reflecting your gradual ascension to the status of deep space explorer;
  • Improve your technological level to launch more sophisticated rockets towards more distant worlds.
